# `FileUploadEvents`

```ts
type FileUploadEvents =
  | { type: 'ADD'; file: File; id: string; bucketId: string; name: string }
  | ({
      type: 'UPLOAD'
      file: File
      id: string
      name: string
      bucketId: string
    } & FileUploadConfig)
  | {
      type: 'UPLOAD_PROGRESS'
      progress: number
      loaded: number
      additions: number
    }
  | { type: 'UPLOAD_DONE'; id: string; bucketId: string }
  | { type: 'UPLOAD_ERROR'; error: ErrorPayload }
  | { type: 'CANCEL' }
  | { type: 'DESTROY' }
```
